title: Media Planner
description:
MediaVibe Solutions is Hiring a Media Planner (Full-Time)

MediaVibe Solutions, a Dublin-based media agency, optimizes campaigns for clients in retail and tech. We’re seeking a Media Planner to craft effective media strategies.

Role Summary
You’ll plan media campaigns to maximize ROI.

Key Tasks
- Develop media plans.
- Analyze audience data with Nielsen.
- Negotiate media placements.
- Track performance.
- Collaborate for alignment.
- Conduct research.
- Stay updated on media trends.
- Prepare client reports.
- Support budget planning.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in media planning, proficient in Nielsen or Comscore. Strong negotiation and analytical skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing or a related field is required.

Why MediaVibe?
We value strategy and collaboration. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a dynamic environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension
25 days of annual leave
Training budget
Media tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join MediaVibe Solutions to drive media success. Submit your application today!
